程序包 callOfDuty

类 Target

java.lang.Object
callOfDuty.Target
直接已知子类:
Armory, Barrack, Ground, HeadQuarter, OilDrum, SentryTower, Tank
public abstract class Target extends Object
Represents the target on the map
作者:
Xinyang Shen

  • 字段概要

    字段
    修饰符和类型
    字段
    说明
    private Base
    base
    An instance of Base that the target is placed in
    private int[]
    coordinate
    An array of length 2 that specifies the coordinate of the head of a target.
    private boolean
    hasExplode
    to keep track of whether a target has been exploded before the initial value should be false
    private int[][]
    hit
    Array of the same size as the target Indicating the number of times a part of the target has been hit
    private boolean
    horizontal
    Indicates whether the Target is horizontal or not
    private int
    length
    The length of the Target
    private int
    width
    The width of the Target width <= length

    构造器
    说明
    Target(int length, int width, Base base)
    This constructor sets the length, the width, the base, and the hit array of the Target.

    setHorizontal(boolean horizontal)
    Sets the value of horizontal
    String
    toString()
    Returns a single-character String to use in the Base's print method(which has been shot at) Returns 'X' if the target has been destroyed Returns 'O' if the target has not been destroyed Returns 'T' if the tank has not been destroyed Returns '-' is the target is ground

  • 字段详细资料

    • coordinate

      private int[] coordinate
      An array of length 2 that specifies the coordinate of the head of a target. Head means the upper left part of a Target.

    • length

      private int length
      The length of the Target

    • width

      private int width
      The width of the Target width <= length

    • horizontal

      private boolean horizontal
      Indicates whether the Target is horizontal or not

    • hit

      private int[][] hit
      Array of the same size as the target Indicating the number of times a part of the target has been hit

    • base

      private Base base
      An instance of Base that the target is placed in

    • hasExplode

      private boolean hasExplode
      to keep track of whether a target has been exploded before the initial value should be false

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Target

      public Target(int length, int width, Base base)
      This constructor sets the length, the width, the base, and the hit array of the Target.
      参数:
      the - length of the target
      the - width of the target
      the - base of the target

  • 方法详细资料

    • getCoordinate

      public int[] getCoordinate()
      返回:
      Returns the coordinate array

    • getHorizontal

      public boolean getHorizontal()
      返回:
      Returns whether the target is horizontal or not (True or False)

    • getHit

      public int[][] getHit()
      返回:
      Returns the hit array

    • getBase

      public Base getBase()
      返回:
      Returns the base

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      返回:
      Returns the length of this target

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      返回:
      Returns the width of this target

    • getHasExp

      private boolean getHasExp()
      返回:
      returns whether if a target has exploded before

    • setCoordinate

      public void setCoordinate(int[] coordinate)
      Sets the coordinate array
      参数:
      coordinate -

    • setHorizontal

      public void setHorizontal(boolean horizontal)
      Sets the value of horizontal
      参数:
      horizontal -

    • setHit

      public void setHit(int[][] hit)
      Sets the value of hit array
      参数:
      hit -

    • setHasExp

      private void setHasExp(boolean hasExp)
      sets the value of whether the target has exploded before
      参数:
      hasExp -

    • explode

      abstract void explode()
      Defines the behavior when a target is destroyed. Some may explode(armory, tank and oil drum), while some do nothing.

    • getTargetName

      public abstract String getTargetName()
      This method is not case sensitive
      返回:
      Returns the type of Target as a String.

    • getShot

      public void getShot(int row, int column)
      If part of the target occupies the given row and column and it is not destroyed, mark the part as "hit" if a target is destroyed, it may cause explosion
      参数:
      given - row
      given - column

    • isDestroyed

      public boolean isDestroyed()
      returns the destroy status of the target for tank, every part should be hit twice
      返回:
      true if every part of the target has been hit, false otherwise

    • isHitAt

      public boolean isHitAt(int row, int column)
      returns the hit status of the target. This method is used to print the base.
      参数:
      given - row
      given - column
      返回:
      true if the target has been hit at the given coordinate

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a single-character String to use in the Base's print method(which has been shot at) Returns 'X' if the target has been destroyed Returns 'O' if the target has not been destroyed Returns 'T' if the tank has not been destroyed Returns '-' is the target is ground
      覆盖:
      toString 在类中 Object
